headline: Here’s Why The AES Corporation (AES) Slid in Q2
summary: Sound Shore Management, an investment management firm, has released its investor letter for the second quarter of 2025. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund’s Investor Class (SSHFX) and Institutional Class (SSHVX) delivered 3.06% and 3.10%, respectively, in the second quarter of 2025 compared to a 3.79% return for the Russell […]
